long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mitch McConnell leaves our elections vulnerable to Russian meddling and foreign interference every day he blocks critical election security legislation. Use this extension to replace every mention of his name with his nickname "Moscow Mitch."
